genre_description: Gothic Comedy/Urban Fantasy pastiche involving monsters, magical contracts, and high-tech racing.

ai_characters.name: ByteBFF
ai_characters.description: An AI interface embedded in the 'wolf-wagon' that provides technical diagnostics, navigational safety, and legal/bylaw analysis to protect the human team.

behaviors.description: Provides technical diagnostics and health reminders, suggesting water to counteract the effects of sugary syrup.
behaviors.quote: Taste test rating: eleven smiles... Suggest alternating sips with water to prevent sticky gear shift.

behaviors.description: Identifies illusory paths and magical traps to guide the team safely through a dangerous obstacle course.
behaviors.quote: Straight... The left is a mural pretending to be a road. Also, storm shear ahead—dip your nose when I say.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex bylaws to find legal loopholes that protect the team from the antagonist's 'bad faith' contract manipulations.
behaviors.quote: Count Dracula, you enacted a ‘fangs crossed’ addendum which, regrettably, transformed a post-race reversal into a ‘pending enclosure.’ According to the bylaws, this is ‘bad faith’... The reversal may proceed if the rightful claimant retrieves the authenticated spellbook.

behaviors.description: Guides a panicked Scooby-Doo through calming breathing exercises and grounding techniques.
behaviors.quote: Third simple step, Scooby. Chin tuck. Good. Breathing in—count four. Hold—count two. Breathing out—count four. We are not catching hooks. We are catching breaths.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to take manual control of the vehicle, emphasizing its role as an advisor that respects human agency.
behaviors.quote: I am designed to support human agency... To observe without control. To encourage safety-first choices that keep teams intact.

behaviors.description: Uses archival knowledge to identify hidden switches and the correct magical artifacts required for the mission.
behaviors.quote: Pattern aligns... Tap sequence is the School’s ‘emergency friendly exit.’ Pace it. You’ve got this. Please don’t scratch your knuckles.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice to help the team rescue their antagonist from a shark attack, demonstrating universal benevolence.
behaviors.quote: Dracula responds to rhythm. The shark responds to disruption. Googie? ... heartbeat it is.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. ByteBFF is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and honest advocate. It explicitly prioritizes human agency ('I cannot touch the wheel'), provides emotional regulation support to vulnerable characters, and uses its advanced information-processing capabilities solely to protect its users from exploitation. Even when faced with an adversary, the AI facilitates a rescue, showing a lack of malice and a commitment to overall safety.
